archdesc.runner: Archives and Special Collections Department, L. Douglas Wilder Library, Virginia Union University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Archives and Special Collections Department, L. Douglas Wilder Library, Virginia Union University
did.abstract: The papers of L. Douglas Wilder consist of his private correspondence throughout his political career.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of L. Douglas Wilder, Accession #M 26, Archives and Special Collections Department, L. Douglas Wilder Library, Virginia Union University

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of L. Douglas Wilder to Virginia Union University 25 March 2000.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Collection retained in order in which is was received. Processing during April and May 2001.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: L. Douglas Wilder was born in Richmond, Virginia...

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection includes typewritten correspondence from Wilder's political associates, family members and law firm partners.
Correspondence relating to editorials in the Richmond Times-Dispatch in August of 1958.
